CustomField.formula:
IF(CONTAINS( ADR_Role_Copy__c , "MM UK"), "MM UK",
IF(CONTAINS( ADR_Role_Copy__c , "MM"), "MM US",
IF(CONTAINS( ADR_Role_Copy__c , "Enterprise"), "Enterprise",
IF(CONTAINS( ADR_Role_Copy__c , "Major Accounts"), "Major Accounts",
IF(CONTAINS( ADR_Role_Copy__c , "Inbound"), "Inbound",
IF(CONTAINS( ADR_Role_Copy__c , "Industrial"), "Industrial",""))))))
CustomField.label: ADR Segment at Transfer
